comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I don't know that this lab had anything to do with it, but Japan was accused of using biologic weapons containing plague (pest) on China in the 1940's: www.worldhealth.net/news/china_is_still_plagued_by_diseas...

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The Arizona republican., January 31, 1911, Image 2, col. 2 reported that there was an outbreak of the plague in Manchuria (Northeast China) and that Japanese bacteriologists investigated the bacillus. This epidemic in Manchuria is perhaps also the reason for the photograph of Mukden, the capital of Manchuria nearby
